Summary: I saw a silvery object which looked almost like gl
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter and myself were riding our atvs north of our home when we bothstopped to point out an object directly in front of us . It was just sitting inthe middle of the ski . At first I thought it was an airliner . The it movedvary fast to the north of us and stopped then went east stopped and droppedabout 1000 ft . then without turning went north stopped and then just zip, itwas gone . it went north east of us .while it was in site we could hear anelectical buzz. I tried to call home on my cell phone but my battery level waslow . Which is odd I thought do to the fact I had just charged it . Also we hadtrouble with our atvs sputering out for a few minutes . this happened 011703.your calinder does not go to the new year .
